lead_paragraph: Carli Lloyd and Alex Morgan each scored as the U.S. women's soccer team defeated New Zealand 2-0 in its debut at the Rio Games on Wednesday, getting off to a solid start in its attempt to win a fourth straight Olympic gold medal.

headline.print_headline: US Women Beats New Zealand 2-0 in Olympic Soccer Tournament
headline.main: US Women Beats New Zealand 2-0 in Olympic Soccer Tournament
